briefTitle: Investigation of Cancer Cell Extravasation Through mRNA Analysis of Organ-specific Endothelial Cells and Microfluidics
officialTitle: Identification of Novel Genes Involved in Cancer Cell Extravasation by Transcriptional Profiling of Primary Organ-specific Endothelial Cells and in Vitro 3D Models
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Genes differentially expressed by bone and muscle ECs
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age between 18-65 years
* patients undergoing cruciate ligament surgery or hip arthroplasty
* subscription of informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

- HIV, HCV, HBV, TPHA viral
